I don't need to name the reasons this game is great because we've all heard plenty of noise about the "revolutionary" Bioshock Infinite. It is very good, but the battles aren't quite as enjoyable as Bioshock, but considering how high that game set the bar, it's definitely a level of greatness I wouldn't expect a company to do more than once. It is possible, but this game is a hair less memorable and ultimately as important as Bioshock, depite the "epic" storytelling and twist ending. I'm still not quite sure whether or not the twist was properly foreshadowed. Also, the bosses are not difficult. Moreover, the game is too easy when compared to Bioshock and especially System Shock 2. I suggest playing on Hard, nothing less. 1999 mode is as insanely difficult as ever, but that's a given. This game had a big impact on me and my understanding of first-person shooters. It's worth playing, even if you didn't play Bioshock. In that case, you'd probably find this game more accessable anyway.
Good.
Genuinely incredible game that makes you think. It has a great pull back factor, thanks to the characterisation. Good work, Irrational!

I cannot recommend a game any higher. This is one of the best, if not THE best story in any video game I've ever played. As a gamer you MUST PLAY THIS GAME. You are truly letting yourself miss out if you do not.

Video Games have come a long way since the time of the dinosaurs. When we played our ataristation 360s with sticks and leaves, we never thought video games would come as far as they did. Well, now here it is: Bioshock Infinite 3-D 2: Electric Slide.

The 2D perspective of the game is rather disappointing, in an age that’s grown used to conventions such as the Virtual Boy and 64 bit power of the Atari Jaguar, but I digress. It fits the mood of the game well enough and really pulls you in to the world of Columbia, South Carolina.

The characters are all stick figures, which is fine for racing games, but not here. The voice acting is equally inexcusable, mostly consisting of a 12 year old yelling into a microphone about that time he got pantsed in gym class. Total laziness.

Overall, I recommend it, but only if you buy the codpiece and 3D glasses that come sold separately. It’s a game for the whole family, but don’t let kids play it.

7.51/10

What I liked the most in Bioshock was the interaction with Elizabeth. There is something happening from the beginning and towards the end you really have a connection with this NPC. Not a lot of games achieve that.

On the story side, it's good but not that good. A lot can be predicted and the ending feels a little bit too much; an explanation more than anything else. Why not explain using scenes and dialogues during the game instead of keeping eveything for the end? I understand that they want a "wow!" effect but I think this could have been done differently.

The combat mechanics are nothing new (except for the sky-lines fights maybe) and become very repetitive at times. I sometime wished for less combat and more story. Especially the fights against the Handyman... did not like those at all. The wepons are also not really interesting and I did not find myself liking one more than the others.

On the visual side of things, it looks great. The environments are gorgeous and diverse. The sound effects are also top notch.

In the end, this is a good game but with little to no replay value. The world, the story and Elizabeth make this game worth playing.
best game i have EVER played

Not even remotely worth full price or any time wasted on it. Bioshock Infinite is the perfect example of games that do nothing very well and getting rewarded for it.
You make choices that have no bearing on anything. Gun upgrades are practically useless as ammo depletion necessitates using underpowered ones you haven't upgraded yet. Elizabeth has no actual presence during gameplay. Lockpicking and finding secrets are obnoxiously easy, even on the touted "90s mode" you'll end up with more lockpicks than there are even doors to unlock. Vigors are mostly crowd control powers that stun outside of 3. The writting is pretty abysmal, mostly consisting of mentioning the Columbia citizens are racist but not doing anything with it, the rest involves a complete botching of how alternate dimensions make sense.

Or if you want a more personal take. I thoroughly regret paying money for this game and wish I had it back.

Diesem Spiel merkt man die Mühe und die Erfahrung der Entwickler eindeutig an!! Vom einfachen Shooter-Gameplay, über das feine, wunderhübsche Designe (+ beeindruckender Grafik), über die unglaubliche Story mitsamt einer Begleiterin, die uns vergessen lässt, das jemals jemand so dumm war uns in einem Zombiespiel mit einer blonden Nervensäge zu ärgern und die interssanten Fähigkeiten deines Charakters die die Reihe schon von Anfang an bereichern, bis hin zum Ende der Story, das den starken Charakteren und den Mühen des "ballerns" alle Ehre macht und uns (zumindestens mir) das Gefühl gibt, dass man gleich weinen muss....oder lachen...so sicher ist das nicht :-)

Wer gerne Shooter zockt, die durch leicht variierende Gegner mit speziellen Fähigleiten immer wieder etwas (!) Denkschmalz fordern und dabei auch noch eine Geschichte erleben will, die dich zwar nicht alles entscheiden lässt, dir aber auch nie das Gefühl gibt, du würdest es nicht tun, der ist hier richtig!! Eines meiner ABSOLUTEN Highlights dieses Jahr!!

¡Excelente juego! con una narrativa que cautiva, te mantiene pegado al asiento, con grandes momentos que hacen a Bioshock Infinite uno de los más grandes juegos dentro del género. Excelentes gráficas, bien ejecutadas, bien optimizadas; el audio cuidado en todos los sentidos, excelente música, voces, efectos, etc. No se arrepentirán.

Переоцененная игра, которая по сути не обладает ни интересным геймплеем, ни хорошим сюжетом. Насчет геймплея-стрелять в игре вообще не интересно, в процессе игры используется только малая часть умений (1-3), так как большая часть бесполезна. Что можно сказать насчет сюжета? В нём нет ничего захватывающего, потрясающего, и он закручен настолько, что это доходит до абсурдного... Возникает вопрос, что успотребляли разрабочики во время создания "шедевра". Единственное, что радует-это графика, не требующая топовых ПК, к тому же. Больше у игры никаких плюсов просто нет. В итоге, никакими 10/10 здесь и подавно не пахнет.

"Лучший шутер 2013 года"
Существуют фильмы-шедевры, книги-шедевры. BioShock Infinite - игра-шедевр.

Игра, сюжет которой получше многих фильмов. Пейзажи летающего города завораживают своей красотой, а спутница главного героя не перестает удивлять своими выходками и нестандартными решениямии. Игра рассказывает нам потрясающую историю, оторваться от которой просто невозможно: на протяжении всего прохождения хочется узнать, что будет дальше (а дальше открывается много неожиданного).

Плюсы игры:
→ Графика (как я уже сказал, картинка завораживает)
→ Сюжет (повторюсь, он достоин отдельной книги)
→ Персонажи (Близнецы Лютес получили титул "Персонаж года")
→ Звук (он действительно на высоте)

Минусы:
> Не очень удобная система сохранений (Если вы вышли из игры не совсем вовремя, будьте готовы, что когда вы зайдете, вам придется потратить пару минут на прохождение того, что вы уже прошли)
> Довольно однообразный геймплей (Игра получила титул "Шутер года", но тем не менее "пострелушки" и собирания патронов со временем надоедают. Мой вам совет: чаще используйте энергетики, это помогает разнообразить геймлей)

Прохождение игры занимает 8-9 часов.

Bioshock Infinite ist nur zur empfehlen. Wer sich zum Kauf entscheidet, kämpft sich durch eine Welt die sich sowohl darin versteht einen nahezu göttliche Stimmung als auch eine Düstere Stimmung zu erschaffen . Die Story die sich ergibt erscheint zu Beginn durchschnittlich. Doch mit ansteigender Spielzeit kommt man immer mehr dahinter was die Story einem erzählen will und wass die vorherigen Handlungen bedeuten. Zwar war mir in der MItte des Spiels etwas langweilig da es vom Gameplay her dort etwas abschwächt.Doch diese lange Weile herrscht nicht lange da die Story beginnt enorm anzuziehen. Ales endet im den grandiosen Ende bei dem ich 10  Min mit offenen Mund vor meinem PC saß und erstmal nachdenken musste. Wirklich  es lohnt sich einfach dies zu Spielen da ihr am Ende einfach dasitzt und alles versteht. Für mich war dies das bis jetzt befriedingste Spieleende das ich je gespielt habe.
I recommend  buy this beautiful game, great gameplay and story.)

Bioshock Infinite in my opinion is one of the most stunning and beautiful games of all time, not just in it's image quality but also the narrative story telling that gamer's have been waiting for. The time that went into this game can be seen through every detail throughout the entire game, the narrative structure keeps you guessing throughout and without spoiling anything you are sure to love the story and scrpit writer's. My only main critiscism is that i wish the game was longer, but i would much rather have quality over quantity and belive me on this. This game definilty doesn't dissapoint. I give this game a 10/10...yes 10/10. Game of the year.
Probably one of the best games of all times. :D
essa franqui Bioshock e otima .... recomendo .

Holy God am I glad this was a 75% off game when I bought it.  For fans of Bioshock 1 and 2, this is not your game!  This is a half-assed attempt to attach a great name to a horrible product.  All of the the charm that made Bioshock playable and replayable is gone.

1.  No more hacking (in person or remotely).  No more complex and entertaining puzzles to solve.
2.  Choices are irrelevant.  Murder everyone in the city and you will be treated the same as if you had spared lives.
3.  Limited to two immediately available plasmids and two weapons...period. 
4.  Storyline just turns stupid at the halfway point.  "Oh, that guy is dead...but it's ok, we'll just go to a parallel dimension."
5.  Characters and choices are shallow and only feign the appearance of option.
6.  No Saving on your own terms.  Autosaves only.  Chapter reloading?  Limited to the last one only.  No chapter selection.
7.  And for those who replay for variety, there is none.  So, don't worry about the crap save.

Dear Irrational, I would love to go back and explore a pre-apocolypse Rapture, but not after seeing what you have done to the best FPS game since Half-Life.  I'll keep my cash and you can sell it to the 6 year old who just wants to mash buttons.

Infinity traz uma ruptura no enredo da franquia. Infelizmente Rapture não é mais o lugar onde a história se passa. Ao invés disso temos Colúmbia. Columbia é o oposto de Rapture. Impossível não comparar. É bem iluminada, enquanto a outra é obscura. Está cituada nas núvens, enquanto a outra está cituada em baixo da água. É absolutamente religiosa, enquanto a outra é completamente avessa à religião. Seus cidadãos não têm muita noção de individualidade, enquanto os cidadãos de Rapture são tão individualistas que de degeneram no egoísmo.

No entanto, Infinity deixa claro que o objetivo dos produtores é proporcionar uma reflexão moral. O jogo não tem um enredo menos filosófico e profundo que os primeiros. Desta vez o intuito não é mostrar qual é a degeneração do egoísmo, e sim qual é a degenaração da coletividade. Infinity fala sobre uma sociedade que acredita cegamente em seu lider, que segue e pratica fielmente todas as suas excentricidades como se fossem os próprios mandamentos divinos.

A história é muito boa! Quase tão emocionante e envolvente como a do segundo jogo. Está cheia de reviravoltas e assim como o primeiro tem um final bem surpreendente. A jogabilidade é a mesma, apesar de que os poderes que vc tem são diferentes. E na minha opinião eles são menos úteis, o que me fez jogar Infinity como um jogo de tiro mais convencional. Isso além do fato do jogo ser mais voltado pro fps. Mais inimigos na tela atirando em vc.

Eu apenas lamento pelo fato da história não se passar em Rapture. Mas o jogo tem uma DLC (que eu ainda não joguei) que se passa em Rapture no período pré guerra civil. Estou bem curioso pra conferir.

Zerado em 01/12/2013
coolest stoty+gameplay ever!

Um excelente jogo, ainda não terminei ele mas estou adorando jogar, a jogabilidade é muito boa, os graficos enchem os olhos e a ambientação é incrivel, todos os personagens são dublados (em ingles) e sempre dizem algo de interessante que te insentiva a ver oque todos tem a dizer

По поводу сюжета:
"Человеческая страсть ко всему навороченному цинично используется в обществе потребления. Но далеко не всегда за навороченностью стоит расчет. Люди боятся показаться недостаточно умными. Люди, считающие себя творческими, — особенно. Авторы учебников — вдвойне. Дизайнеры — втройне. Для маскировки используется заумь. Чем непонятнее выразился, тем лучше — никто не обвинит в отсутствии оригинальности. Если бы миром заведовал среднестатистический дизайнер, то на дорогах вместо белых полос разметки были бы виньетки в стиле хохломы, палеха и гжели. Красиво ведь."(Артемий Лебедев)

По поводу геймплея:
 Заявка была на невероятно крутой геймплей, авторы грозились невероятным экшеном, где у тебя нет шансов отсиживаться в бою где-нибудь в углу. У меня спокойно получалось отсиживаться с револьвером в углах, и укладывать всех ваншотами в голову. Даже патроны искать не нужно, всё принесёт Элизабет. Разве что от Handyman'ов приходилось уныло "укатываться". Столько сил вложили в геймплей, а геймплей-то и не нужен. Абсолютно уродский приём с "другими измерениями", когда нельзя спокойно провести курсором по экрану, чтобы не быть ослеплённым мразными вспышками.

Плюсы не изменились с прошлых частей, а минусов прескорбных добавилось.
Good shooter and story, but little replay value ;/
